General.Name: Empress Royalty Corp
General.Description: Empress Royalty Corp. acquires royalty and streaming interests in precious metal mines and mining projects. The company focuses on small to mid-tier producing or development stage mining companies. It also holds interest in the manica project royalty, the pinos project royalty, and the canadian exploration royalties projects. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 15782 Marine Drive, White Rock, BC, Canada, V4B 1E6
